\leftheader{Author Name in Left Header}
\journal{Journal Name}
\volume{Volume}
\ccoppy{Copyright Notice}
\copnum{More Copyright Information}

\author{Author Name}
\authorsaffiliations{Institution Name}

\course{Course: Name}
\professor{Professor Name}
\duedate{Due Date}
\abstract{Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed ac purus sit amet nisl tincidunt tincidunt. Nullam ac nulla vel libero ultrices.}
\keywords{Key, Words}
\authornote{Address. Contact: \addORCIDlink{Author Name}{0000\--0000\--0000\--0000}: Correspondence concerning this article should be addressed to Author Name, Institution Name.}
